questions: Who was recently elected as the new president of the European Council of the European Union?
Consider the following statements about Exercise Khan Quest, held between 27 July and 9 August 2024:
Which country recently became the world's first country to prepare a complete checklist of its entire fauna?
In which year was Nalanda University included in the World Heritage Site?
What is 'K2-18B' recently in the news?
What is 'Aedes albopictus' recently in the news?
In which state is the Ghodbandar Fort located?
In which country is the Ruang volcano located, which is recently in the news due to its eruption?
Recently, Halldora Tomasdottir was elected president of which country?
Who recently received the Hindi Sahitya Bharati Award 2024?
In which state is the Ujani dam located, which was recently in the news?
Which country did India send the sacred Sarayu river water for the Abhishek ceremony of the Sita Amma temple dedicated to Goddess Sita?
Pema Khandu recently became the Chief Minister of which northeastern state?
Recently, ISRO decided to achieve debris-free space by which year?
Recently, where did 'Japan India Maritime Exercise 2024 (JIMEX-24)' begin?
Recently, 'Kathiya wheat' has been given a Geographical Indication (GI) tag, which state is it related to?
Who is the current president of the World Bank?
Archaeologists of Kerala University recently discovered a 5200-year-old Harappan-era settled area in which place?
Where was the inauguration of India's first green hydrogen plant in the stainless steel sector done?
Who was not honored with the 58th Jnanpith Award of the year 2023?
When was the 44th 'Homecoming Day' celebrated in which country?
In which country is 'Matatirtha Aunsi' or Mother's Day celebrated?
Between which countries was the joint military exercise 'Maitri' organized?
Which actor was awarded the 'Lata Dinanath Mangeshkar Award 2024'?
In which country was the Rabanda bill passed?
In which country is the 'Ashdod Port' located, which was recently in the news?
In which state was the 'Paramveer Chakra Park' inaugurated?
In which state are the Churchill Bhojshala and Kamal Maula Masjid located?
Which state has launched the 'Widow Remarriage Incentive Scheme'?
Between which countries was the maritime exercise 'Samudra Lakshman' organized?
explanations: Charles Michel was re-elected as the President of the European Council in March 2022.
Both statements are correct about Exercise Khan Quest.
India recently became the world's first country to prepare a complete checklist of its entire fauna.
Nalanda University was included in the World Heritage Site in 2016.
K2-18B is an exoplanet that has the potential to support life.
Aedes albopictus is a mosquito species that is a major vector for dengue and Zika viruses.
Ghodbandar Fort is located in Maharashtra.
The Ruang volcano is located in Indonesia.
Halldora Tomasdottir was recently elected president of Iceland.
Smita Vishwakarma recently received the Hindi Sahitya Bharati Award 2024.
The Ujani dam is located in Maharashtra.
India sent the sacred Sarayu river water for the Abhishek ceremony of the Sita Amma temple dedicated to Goddess Sita in Nepal.
Pema Khandu recently became the Chief Minister of Arunachal Pradesh.
ISRO decided to achieve debris-free space by 2035.
The 'Japan India Maritime Exercise 2024 (JIMEX-24)' began in Yokosuka, Japan.
Kathiya wheat is related to Gujarat.
Ajay Banga is the current president of the World Bank.
Archaeologists of Kerala University recently discovered a 5200-year-old Harappan-era settled area in Rakhigarhi, Haryana.
The inauguration of India's first green hydrogen plant in the stainless steel sector was done in Pune, Maharashtra.
Only statement 3 is correct. The 58th Jnanpith Award of the year 2023 was not awarded to any writer.
The 44th 'Homecoming Day' was celebrated in Bangladesh.
Matatirtha Aunsi or Mother's Day is celebrated in Nepal.
The joint military exercise 'Maitri' was organized between India and Nepal.
Ajay Devgn was awarded the 'Lata Dinanath Mangeshkar Award 2024'.
The Rabanda bill was passed in Nepal.
The 'Ashdod Port' is located in Israel.
The 'Paramveer Chakra Park' was inaugurated in Kerala.
The Churchill Bhojshala and Kamal Maula Masjid are located in Madhya Pradesh.
Bihar has launched the 'Widow Remarriage Incentive Scheme'.
The maritime exercise 'Samudra Lakshman' was organized between India and Malaysia.
